Interface IPayerIdType

Common interface for components that can validate and normalise user input for a particular type of payer id.

Namespace: Yort.OnlineEftpos
Assembly: Yort.OnlineEftpos.dll
Syntax
public interface IPayerIdType

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

Name

Returns the name of this payer id type as known by the Online EFTPOS API.

Declaration
string Name { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

IsValid(String)

Returns true if the specified value is a valid payer id of this type.

Declaration
bool IsValid(string value)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String value
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

True if value is a valid payer id of this type.
Remarks

This method does not modify the input in any way, use the Normalize(String) method to sanitise the input before calling this method.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Normalize(String)

Takes the given userInput and attempts to 'normalise' it, that is remove unneccesary characters, format and validate the result.

Declaration
string Normalize(string userInput)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String userInput

The input to be corrected.
Returns
Type Description
System.String

A string containing the normalised form of the input.
Exceptions
Type Condition
OnlineEftposInvalidDataException

Thrown if the result cannot be normalised or results in an invalid value.
